headline: The Worst Thing I Ever Heard
abstract: Not long after her killing, someone left a racist message on my office phone at Barnard, where she had been a student. Why?
lead_paragraph: I wasnâ€™t expecting to get any messages on my answering machine at Barnard College on Christmas Day. But there was one. So I hit play, thinking it might be greetings from an old friend, or even a stranger, wishing to share the good will of the season.
